name: intellect
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 [ U ] the ability to understand and to think in an intelligent way: Her energy and intellect are respected all over the world. He is a man more noted for his intellect than his charm.
[ C ] formal a very educated person whose interests are studying and other activities that involve careful thinking

a person’s ability to think and understand esp. ideas at a high level: [ C ] The stroke left her partially paralyzed, but her intellect was not affected.
